name: Ace Of Space (itch) (horse head dev)
description:
******************************

Ace of Space is a fast passed arcade top-down space shooter, with tons of guns and customizations to unlock, survive as long as you can at the onslaught of enemies, and get the highest score possible. Each time you die your overall score accumulates to level up and unlock more power. Become the ultimate weapon of destruction.

FEATURES

******************************

  • Seven Powerful Weapons
  • Three Super Weapons
  • Various Visual customizations
  • Eight distinct enemy types
  • Slow Motion
  • Arcade Action

Next Update Features

******************************

  • Controller Support
  • Rebindable Keys
  • More Save slots
  • Linux Version
